archery_spine_catalog.description: Comprehensive archery spine calculation and arrow selection reference

structure.note: This catalog has been split into multiple files for better organization and maintainability

calculation_formulas.json.description: Mathematical formulas and adjustments for calculating proper arrow spine
contains: Adjustment formulas for length, point weight, bow speed, release type

conversion_tables.json.description: Conversion tables between different spine systems and measurement units
contains: Spine equivalents between carbon, aluminum, and wood systems

spine_charts.json.description: Comprehensive spine charts from various manufacturers
contains: Wood arrow spine charts (POC, Pine, Douglas Fir, Birch)

materials_and_components.json.description: Arrow materials, component specifications, and building guidelines
contains: Carbon, aluminum, and wood arrow properties
Safety considerations for all arrow types

usage_notes.getting_started: Begin with calculation_formulas.json to understand spine calculation basics
usage_notes.spine_selection: Use spine_charts.json to find appropriate spine for your setup
usage_notes.conversions: Reference conversion_tables.json for spine equivalents and unit conversions
usage_notes.tuning: Follow procedures in tuning_and_safety.json for optimal arrow flight
usage_notes.troubleshooting: Use troubleshooting_and_resources.json to diagnose and fix issues

important_disclaimers: Always consult manufacturer charts for the most current recommendations
Spine calculations are approximations - fine-tuning may be required
Safety should always be the top priority when selecting arrows
Different manufacturers may have variations in spine values
Environmental conditions can affect arrow performance

file_format.validation: All files should be valid JSON format
file_format.compatibility: Compatible with standard JSON parsers and archery calculation software
